pageContext.description: Stop ridge is shallow and is beaten in and not cast.
pageContext.patina: Reddu brown flakes over brassy green.
pageContext.publications: A label on blade states: "West Butterwick Arc. 1840". Does this refer to Archaeologia for that year? NO.
pageContext.collection: City and County Museum, Lincoln,from the Collection of the Late Ed. Peacock, Esq, FSA, and presented by the family to the museum June 1915.,Ref. No. 297.15
pageContext.toSearch: West Butterwick, Scunthorpe, North Lincolnshire Dn17, UK
pageContext.remarks: A paper label, stuck to the blade reads "West Butterwick, arc 1840", this is probably: "West Butterwick, circ. 1840"
